embeds.description:
-Welcome! Thanks for reaching out.
To get started, please provide the details below — the clearer your request, the better the result.

-Project type:
(e.g., medieval castle, modern villa, fantasy island, redstone farm)

-Size / area:
(e.g., 200×200 blocks, full spawn island, 3 buildings on a hill)

-Style & references:
(e.g., “Hermitcraft S8”, “Japanese minimalism”) — screenshots welcome

-Budget:
Specify in USD, RUB, or KZT

-Deadline:
Exact date or “no rush”

-Extras:
Interiors? Landscaping? Hidden rooms? Specific materials? Lighting?

-Payment methods:
Bank cards from Kazakhstan and Russia, cryptocurrency (USDT, BTC, ETH — confirm before payment)
embeds.title: ORDER ticket
